title: Maigret Jnr - Sick Friends EP
description:
Maigret Jnr - Sick Friends EP

> If you like it, buy it !

The title track from the debut EP from Ru Davies, AKA Maigret Jnr. [Soundcloud], features a bouncy bassline, an R&B backbeat, effective use of a string section and some almost tropical-sounding guitar rearing its head mid-way through the song, which lasts all of six minutes. To top it all off, we have DaviesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s portentous baritone and bleak lyrical outlook (heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not just drawing comparisons to Leonard Cohen for his voice, you know), as well as one of the most arresting opening lines weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve heard all year: Ã¢â‚¬ËœThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s friends of mine who are trying to get better, but itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a waste of time in this kind of weatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. Things get even gloomier from there, but the contrast between the delivery of the lyrics and the music that surrounds it could not be more marked, and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s this contrast, not to mention the melange of styles that Davies throws together, that make Sick Friends one of the most compelling debuts of the year.
